title: Which selection statements will display true

content.question:
Assume that the Boolean variable x is assigned the value true and the Boolean variable y is assigned the value false. Which of the following will display the value true ?
Select two answers.

choices.label: The figure presents a block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code are nested blocks of code. [Begin block] Line 1: IF [begin block] x [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] x OR y [end block] [End Block] [End Block] [End Block]

The figure presents a block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code are nested blocks of code. [Begin block] Line 1: IF [begin block] x OR y [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] x [end block] [End Block] [End Block] [End block]

The figure presents a block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code are nested blocks of code. [Begin block] Line 1: IF [begin block] x OR y [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] x AND y [end block] [End Block] [End Block] [End Block]

The figure presents a block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code are nested blocks of code. [Begin block] Line 1: IF [begin block] x AND y [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] x OR y [end block] [End Block] [End Block] [End block]

content.answer: The figure presents a block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code are nested blocks of code. [Begin block] Line 1: IF [begin block] x [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] x OR y [end block] [End Block] [End Block] [End Block]

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
